description.value: Any Enemy the character has not already attacked this encounter must pass a +20 Intelligence Test to attack them so long as there is a friendly character with a Size Trait of a higher value within 5 metres. If a foe fails this test, they ignore the character and favour the larger target instead.

system.benefit: Any Enemy the character has not already attacked this encounter must pass a +20 Intelligence Test to attack them so long as there is a friendly character with a Size Trait of a higher value within 5 metres. If a foe fails this test, they ignore the character and favour the larger target instead.
